name: Porto Flip
description: A classic drink made with port, brandy, and a whole egg, from Bourbon and Branch in San Francisco.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces ruby port, preferably Six Grapes

recipeInstructions.text: Add brandy, port, and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker. Add egg (yolk and white.) Shake vigorously for one minute. Strain into an old fashioned glass. Top with freshly grated nutmeg.
